attributes.label: INTERVAL
attributes.value: Double strike 0.33s between attacks, 1s between sets.

spell2.name: CLOBBERIN' TIME
spell2.description: Uses immense power to launch all enemies in front of you into the air.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: Step spell field: 3m high, 10m wide, advancing 2m every 0.1 seconds, up to a maximum of 18m

spell3.name: STONE HAYMAKER

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Move forward 3 meters while punching, gaining 50 Bonus Health during skill activation; Knocks down hit flying enemies

spell3.changeDescription: New effect: knocks down hit flying enemies

spell4.name: YANCY STREET CHARGE
spell4.description: Continuously charge forward, launching up enemies and leaving behind a zone at the final position that prevents the use of mobility abilities.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Charge: 30; ground slam: 20; immobilization zone: 15 per/s

attributes.label: SPELL FIELD RANGE
attributes.value: Ground slam: 8m radius, 2.5m high cylindrical spell field. Immobilization zone: 8m radius, 4m high cylindrical spell field

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Gain 200 Bonus Health during skill activation⚬ Leave behind a zone at final position that prevents the use of mobility spells

spell4.changeDescription: Bugfix: pathing corrected on 2025‑05‑15 (no numeric change)

spell5.name: EMBATTLED LEAP
spell5.description: Jump towards your ally and apply damage reduction to both of you.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Apply a 25% damage reduction effect to self and target ally for 3s; Shares a cooldown and recharge time with Battle Blitz

spell5.changeDescription: Damage reduction decreased 30% → 25%; Bugfix: cannot target allies inside enemy Invisible Woman ult (no numeric)

spell6.name: BATTLE BLITZ
spell6.description: Jump toward an enemy and apply damage reduction to self.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Apply a 25% damage reduction effect to self for 3s; Shares a cooldown and recharge time with Embattled Leap

spell6.changeDescription: New ability added: Battle Blitz (DR 25%, 20m range, shares charges with Embattled Leap)

spell7.name: UNYIELDING WILL
spell7.description: Immune to launch up, knockback, and other displacement effects.

spell8.name: COSMIC FASTBALL
spell8.description: Wolverine, Hulk and The Thing can interact with eachother. Once both parties can confirm, Hulk or The Thing can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.
spell8.changeDescription: no changes; Added team‑up 'First Steps' (Flying Thing) with Human Torch (separate team‑up entry)

spell9.name: COOPERATIVE COMRADES
spell9.description: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team. This formidable force bolsters Mister Fantastic, The Thing and Human Torch, granting damage resistance. Once activated they can continually generate bonus health, making up for lost health with each passing moment.
